description:
A sword technique.
The starter of any one-handed sword combo.
name: Slash

description:
A sword technique.
Slashes strongly at the foe.
name: Hard Cut

description:
A sword technique.
Slashes in a wide arc with the blade.
name: Wide Arc

description:
A sword technique.
Uses the power of circles(!!!) to slash your foes.
name: Circle Blade

description:
Enhances all sword skills to be able to charge and release \Skill[6].
All 1H-sword skills can also hit twice now.
name: Discipline of Sword

description:
A sword technique.
A wicked-fast slash that hits numerous times and scales with proficiency.
name: Forever Slash

description:
A greatsword technique.
The starter of any two-handed sword combo.
name: Gash

description:
A greatsword technique.
A wide, sweeping slash that easily hits many foes.
name: Sweeping Blade

description:
A greatsword technique that can charge and release \Skill[10] once learned.
A deliberate slash that is precisely 180 degrees like the half moon phase.
name: Half-moon Slash

description:
A charged and released \Skill[10] greatsword technique.
A crushing blow of preposterous power with the full weight of the blade.
name: Crashdown

description:
A dual-wielded-sword technique.
The starter of any dual-wielded sword combo.
name: Flash

description:
A dual-wielded-sword technique.
A very fast slice designed to link into more additional combo skills.
name: Quick Slice

description:
A dual-wielded-sword technique.
A strike so fast that it actually counts as two.
name: Double Cut

description:
A dual-wielded-sword technique that can charge and release \Skill[14] once learned.
A swift and sharp twist of the blade in the gut.
name: Cross Slash

description:
A charged and released \Skill[14] dual-wielded-sword technique.
Spin in rapid circles to hit all nearby enemies repeatedly.
name: Topspin

description:
A spear technique.
The starter of any sharp spear combo.
name: Thrust

description:
A spear technique.
A quick follow-up jab.
name: Quick Jab

description:
A spear technique that can charge and release \Skill[19] once learned.
A fairly long-ranged stabbing for those far-away foes.
name: Reaching Stab

description:
A charged and released \Skill[18] spear technique.
Known for its destructivity, it penetrates multiple enemies multiple times.
name: Corkscrew Dive

description:
A basher technique.
The starter of any blunt spear combo.
name: Thump

description:
A basher technique.
Swinging after stabbing catches everyone offguard.
name: Thwomp

description:
A basher technique.
A harder and more violent thump.
name: Thremp

description:
A basher technique.
A violent swing forth launching a small shockwave forward.
name: Flamp

description:
Enhances \Skill[23].
\Skill[23]'s shockwave lasts 100% longer and hits multiple times.
name: Flampwave

description:
Enhances \Skill[23].
\Skill[23]'s shockwave will generate TP/hit.
name: Flampergize

description:
Enhances \Skill[23].
\Skill[23]'s shockwave will apply on-hit effects.
name: Flamplord

description:
A javelin technique.
The starter of any thrown spear combo.
name: Hurl

description:
A javelin technique.
Throws a javelin with incredible speed and precision.
name: Snipe

description:
Enhances \Skill[28] to be able to charge and release \Skill[30].
\Skill[28] can be flies ~33% farther and attacks penetrate up to 8 foes.
name: Longthrow
note:
<skillExtend:[28]>
<duration:120>
<pierce:[8,120]>
<chargeTier:[1,90,30]>
<hideFromJabsMenu>

// empowers snipe and gives it a charge.

description:
The first charge tier release of \Skill[28].
Throws a massive energy bolt as though it was a javelin.
name: Sonic Boom

description:
A pistol technique, for the mainhand.
The starter of any melee gun combo.
name: Snap

description:
A pistol technique, for the mainhand.
A powerful melee strike with a sickening crack.
name: Crack

description:
A pistol technique, for the mainhand.
A downward strike cements your victory over their face.
name: Plop

description:
Enhances \Skill[33].
Landing \Skill[33] now grants \State[43], temporarily upgrading \Skill[35] to \Skill[36].
name: Gun-fu
note:
<skillExtend:[33]>
<onHitSelfState:[43,100]>
<hideFromJabsMenu>

// extends plop to grant the offhand
// changing state.

description:
A pistol technique, for the offhand.
A standard gunshot with a bit of recoil.
name: Gunshot

description:
A pistol technique, for the offhand.
An empowered gunshot with a bit of recoil.
name: Burst Shot

description:
A taser technique, for the mainhand.
The starter of any direct gun combo.
name: Pin

description:
A taser technique, for the mainhand.
After pinning your target, initialize the electrical flow by pressing the button.
name: Zap

description:
A taser technique, for the mainhand.
Repeated usage of \Skill[39] will cost tech, but allow rapid dispatch of targets.
name: Overcharge

description:
A taser technique, for the offhand.
Directly strikes a target and all nearby targets, may apply \State[4](50%).
name: Shock

description:
Enhances \Skill[40].
\Skill[40] now applies \State[57], and hits multiple times.
name: Shock Shadow
note:
<skillExtend:[40]>
<pierce:[4,2]>
<hideFromJabsMenu>

// extends plop to grant the offhand
// changing state.

description:
Enhances \Skill[40].
\Skill[40] now costs twice as much, but scales with proficiency and can crit.
name: EMP Shock
note:
<skillExtend:[40]>
<hideFromJabsMenu>

// extends plop to grant the offhand
// changing state.

description:
A shotgun technique, for the mainhand.
The starter of any spread gun combo.
name: Scattershot

description:
A shotgun technique, for the mainhand.
Hits a tremendous number of times in a nova.
name: Scatterspray

description:
Enhances \Skill[44].
\Skill[44] now causes \State[61], has -33% cooldown, and has reduced damage variance.
name: Aka Splatterspray

description:
A hatchet technique.
The starter of any one-handed axe combo.
name: Cleave

description:
A hatchet technique.
A fairly powerful swing with the heavy axe.
name: Heavy Swing

description:
A hatchet technique.
An extremely deadly swing that deals heavy damage.
name: Obliteration

description:
Enhances \Skill[48].
\Skill[48] now applies \State[58] to self, increasing max life and defenses temporarily.
name: Stand Tall
note:
<skillExtend:[48]>
<onCastSelfState:[58,100]>
<hideFromJabsMenu>

// extends obliteration to grant
// bonus health/damage.

description:
A battleaxe technique.
The starter of any two-handed axe combo.
name: Rend

description:
A battleaxe technique.
A quick horizontal slice like you're trying to behead your foes.
name: Behead

description:
A battleaxe technique.
A powerful downward hacking slash attack that hits all nearby foes.
name: Crash Hack

description:
A battleaxe technique.
A destructive wave emitted from swinging your axe at the speed of light.
name: Destroyer

description:
A battleaxe technique.
Embrace your inner berserker and eviscerate your foes with this attack.
name: Eviscerate

description:
Enhances all battleaxe weapon skills.
Said skills may apply \State[59](10%), reducing move speed and disabling crit evasion.
name: Hamstring

description:
Enhances \Skill[55].
\Skill[55] applies \State[60] to self on-hit, granting bonus move speed and crit chance.
name: Bloodlust

description:
A twin-axe technique.
The starter of any double-ended axe combo.
name: Spin

description:
A twin-axe technique.
A wide twirl, almost ballet-like in it's deadly precision.
name: Twirl

description:
A twin-axe technique.
The starter of any basic twin-axe combo.
name: Wheeling

description:
A twin-axe technique.
A wicked and repeatable spinning technique making a woodchipper look like a child's toy.
name: Cyclone

description:
A staff technique.
The starter any two-handed staff combo.
name: Spray

description:
A staff technique.
Fires a triad of magical energies that homes into the last target.
name: Barrage

description:
Enhances \Skill[61] and \Skill[62].
Both skills fires in a nova formation, and recover TP/hit.
name: Invigorating Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[61] and \Skill[62].
Either skill can now be charged to release \Skill[65].
name: Charging Blast

description:
The first charge tier release of \Skill[61] and \Skill[62].
Fires a nova of magical homing energies that will repeatedly strike foes.
name: Carpet Bombing

description:
A wand technique.
The starter of any one-handed staff combo.
name: Beam

description:
A wand technique.
A shot of magical energy that can hit an enemy multiple times.
name: Bounce

description:
A wand technique.
A burst of magical energy that can hit multiple enemies multiple times.
name: Burst

description:
Enhances \Skill[66], \Skill[67], and \Skill[68].
Any of those skills can now be charged to release \Skill[70].
name: Charging Laser

description:
The first charge tier release of \Skill[66], \Skill[67], and \Skill[68].
Fires a deadly laser beam straight ahead that will pierce enemies repeatedly.
name: Searing Laser

description:
A tome technique.
The starter of any tome combo.
name: Hex

description:
A tome technique.
A spell that can strike multiple nearby targets around the foe.
name: Chant

description:
Enhances \Skill[71] and \Skill[72].
Both skills now hit in an medium area.
name: Bellowing Voice

description:
Enhances \Skill[71] and \Skill[72].
Both skills can now be charged and release \Skill[75].
name: Charged Voice

description:
A charged tome technique.
A spell that can strike multiple nearby targets around the foe.
name: Kajinx

description:
A punching technique.
The starter of any punching fist combos.
name: Punch

description:
A punching technique.
A quick jab after the initial punch.
name: Jab

description:
A punching technique.
The old one-two follow-up to the jab.
name: One-Two

description:
A punching technique.
Entering flow consumes TP, but enables rapid punches to grind your foes to dust.
name: Flow

description:
Enhances \Skill[79].
Every strike of \Skill[79] hits twice, and hits a wider area.
name: Mirrored Flow

description:
A claw technique.
The starter of any slashing fist combos.
name: Scratch

description:
A claw technique.
Rip through your foes effortlessly.
name: Rip

description:
A claw technique.
Tear through foes like paper with your sharp ass claws.
name: Tear

description:
Enhances all claw techniques.
All claw techniques may apply \State[15](33%) and/or \State[11](33%).
name: Animalistic Instinct

description:
Enhances all claw techniques.
Enables charging any claw skill to release \Skill[86].
name: Apex Predator

description:
A charged claw technique.
Wildly gores all nearby foes and most certainly applies \State[15].
name: Gore

description:
A beating technique.
The starter of any brutish fist combos.
name: Beatdown

description:
A beating technique.
A devastating elbow bearing the full weight of the attack against the foes.
name: Flying Elbow

description:
Enhances \Skill[87].
Enables charging to release \Skill[90] instead.
name: Reckless Abandon

description:
A charged beating technique.
A world-crushing elbow bearing the full wrath of your lordly girth.
name: Lordly Elbow

description:
Deals moderate air-elemental damage multiple times in a line.
Especially effective versus flying enemies.
name: Sonic Wave

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The wave now flies roughly 30% further and hits additional times.
name: Sonic Distance

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The wave can now land critical hits and has -20% cooldown.
name: Sonic Striker

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The damage formula now scales with skill proficiency.
name: Sonic Violence

description:
Enhances \Skill[101].
The wave now hits even more times, and has a -40% cooldown instead.
name: Sonic Speed

description:
Deals light ground-elemental damage numerous times to all enemies hit by the boulder.
Especially effective versus construct enemies.
name: Boulderdash

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
The boulder now may stun(2%/hit) and has -20% cooldown.
name: Bouldercrush

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
The boulder now hits more frequently and has -30% cooldown.
name: Boulderspikes

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
\Skill[106] will now fire a W(3) of boulders infront of the caster.
name: Boulderbananza

description:
Enhances \Skill[106].
The boulders will now hit even more frequently and scales with proficiency.
name: Boulderdoom

description:
Launches multiple air-elemental arcs infront of you.
Especially effective versus Beasts.
name: V Blade

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
The arcs now generate TP(+2 per hit) on hitting foes, and hits more times.
name: V for Vitality

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
The arcs now may poison(10%/hit) targets and the formula multipliers are increased.
name: V for Virulent

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
The arcs now may apply on-hit effects(50%) and can now crit.
name: V for Versatile

description:
Enhances \Skill[111].
\Skill[111] will now fire three arcs, generates more TP(+5 per hit), and hits more times.
name: V for Venerable

description:
Stomps the ground extremely hard to deal ground-element damage to all nearby foes.
Especially effective versus slime enemies. Inflicts \State[18] on any damaged foe.
name: Siesmic Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp now generates vibrations that cause damage after the initial shock.
name: Angry Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp radius is increased by 100%.
name: Deep Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp is now a square hitbox, scales with proficiency, and hits more times.
name: Geometric Stomp

description:
Enhances \Skill[116].
The stomp's cooldown is greatly reduced (-50%) and now reduces foes defenses(-33%).
name: Deliberate Stomp

description:
Fires a twist into the air that spirals and absorbs energy from foes it touches.
Especially effective versus enemies with an aura.
name: Vacuum Twist

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
The twist now lasts 50% longer (+1s) and hits more times.
name: Twist Plus

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
The damage formula has increased multipliers and can now crit.
name: Twist Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
The twist now hits more frequently and may inflict \State[7](25%/hit).
name: Twist Betwixt

description:
Enhances \Skill[121].
Now fires off a cross(4) of twists that now all generate TP(+1/hit).
name: Twist Cross

description:
Fires an large chunk of earth straight ahead dealing moderate earth damage.
Especially effective versus Insects.
name: Geo Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -20% cooldown and generates TP (+1/hit).
name: Quick Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -40% cooldown and is also effective against aquatic foes.
name: Hook Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -60% cooldown and may inflict \State[23](33%/hit).
name: Shatter Shot

description:
Enhances \Skill[126].
The shot now has -80% cooldown, can crit, and scales with proficiency.
name: Deadly Shot

description:
Take a moment to just breathe and focus on the raw air elemental energy around you.
Heals and grants \State[24], granting bonus critical hit chance.
name: Breathe

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[25]- granting bonus hits, hit chance, and crit chance.
name: Zen Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[26]- improving all before and granting chance on hit to apply \State[6](15%).
name: Night Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[27]- improving all before and reducing TP costs.
name: Sake Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[131].
The breath also grants \State[28]- improving all before and guaranteeing autocounter procs.
name: Righteous Breath

description:
Conjures a wild armor of earth that is rippling with spines.
Grants \State[29], bolstering various defensive stats.
name: Earthen Armor

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The armor also grants \State[30].
name: Rock Spines

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The armor also grants \State[31].
name: Metallic Spines

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The armor also grants \State[32].
name: Hollow Spines

description:
Enhances \Skill[136].
The armor also grants \State[33].
name: Star Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of ground-elemental damage to the attacker.
Scales with attacker's health, grants a small bonus of TP.
name: Hard Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage to the attacker.
Is especially effective against undead.
name: Silver Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of void-elemental damage and applies
\State[10], \State[11], and \State[12] to the attacker.
name: Void Spines

description:
Deals a moderate amount of non-elemental damage to the attacker.
Scales with attacker's health and your proficiency.
name: Otherworldy Spines

description:
Why try when you could just not try?
Absolute annihilation in all directions.
name: Megashock

description:
Sprays a wave of unfiltered space-time-absorbing energy in
a direction. Obliterates everything in its path.
name: Gigashock

description:
Why try when you could just not try?
Absolute annihilation in all directions.
name: Omnishock

description:
Your standard in fiery damage fare- deals moderate heat elemental damage.
Fires a single ball of flame straight ahead.
name: Fireball

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
The hitbox of the fireball is increased and hits all targets available.
name: Bulbous Ball

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
May apply \State[34](50%) increasing incoming heat damage, and hit times increased.
name: Vengeful Flames

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
The fireball is even bigger, and the damage formula scales with proficiency.
name: Massive Ball

description:
Enhances \Skill[151].
The fireball now has -50% cooldown, and may self-apply \State[42](25%) on-cast.
name: Pyromaniac

description:
Deals a small amount of fire-elemental damage per fireball.
Shoots a nova(8) of fireballs all around the caster.
name: Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette now hits more times and reaches about 50% further.
name: Full Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette may inflict \State[4](33%) and generates more TP(+3/hit).
name: Static Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette now has knockback and has increased damage.
name: Force Nova

description:
Enhances \Skill[156].
Each novalette may inflict \State[34](33%).
name: Vengeful Nova

description:
Spews forth flame like a dragon, dealing light heat-elemental damage repeatedly.
May inflict \State[36](50%) to any damaged foes, causing increased vulnerability to heat damage.
name: Dragon Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
The breath may also inflict \State[37](50%) and has -20% cooldown.
name: Rancid Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
The breath now scales with proficiency and now may crit.
name: Skillful Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
The breath now hits more frequently and generates more TP(+2/hit).
name: Blasting Breath

description:
Enhances \Skill[161].
\Skill[161] will now fire a trio of breaths infront of the caster.
name: Spreading Breath

description:
A very fast whip of extremely hot flames dealing large amounts of heat elemental damage in a line.
Very strong, but have to be in close proximity to land the blow.
name: Lava Whip

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The whip now generates TP(+4/hit) and hits more times.
name: Bouncy Coil

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The whip is now especially effective versus shielded foes.
name: Segmented Coil

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The whip has a longer range and may stun(5%/hit) the target.
name: Extended Coil

description:
Enhances \Skill[166].
The damage multipliers are greatly increased and scales with proficiency.
name: Power Coil

description:
Reach forth into the depths of the abyss to understand the true meaning of flame.
Grants \State[38], bestowing bonus force to the caster.
name: Molten Wisdom

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now grants \State[39] which increases force more.
name: Mysticism

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now has -20% cooldown.
name: Quick-witted

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now applies \State[40] and increases force even further.
name: Blazing Inversion

description:
Enhances \Skill[171].
The wisdom now applies \State[41] and increases force even further.
name: Explosive Inversion

description:
Shoots a single fireball dealing light heat-elemental damage.
Due to low elemental requirements, this can be cast in rapid succession.
name: Rapid Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
\Skill[176] now launches a V(2) when casted.
name: Bifurcating Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
The cinders now generate TP(+3/hit) and hits more often.
name: Bursting Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
The cinders may inflict \State[36](10%), scales with skill proficiency, and scales with target's current health.
name: Dragon Cinders

description:
Enhances \Skill[176].
\Skill[176] now launches a W(3) when casted and hits more often.
name: Trifurcating Cinders

description:
Generates a "sun" on the field derived from pure elemental energy.
Heals all allies in the vicinity of the "sun" with every pulse.
name: Sun's Touch

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
The sun's pulse now has 33% increased range, and also heals TP(+15/pulse).
name: Radiant Sun

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
The sun's pulse now may revive the dead(50%).
name: Glorious Sun

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
The sun's pulse will now follow the party.
name: Loving sun

description:
Enhances \Skill[181].
\Skill[181]'s healing now scales with skill proficiency and has -20% cooldown.
name: Sage's Sun

description:
Flames erupt from all around you, dealing moderate heat-elemental damage to all nearby foes.
Especially effective versus shielded enemies.
name: Eruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flame's range is increased by 20% and generates TP(+10/hit)
name: Irruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flames now cause additional MP damage.
name: Corruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flames now hit more times and may inflict \State[36](50%).
name: Disruption

description:
Enhances \Skill[186].
The flames now scale with skill proficiency and hit more times.
name: Leyruption

description:
Applies \State[44] to self and reduces own aggro by 500.
Restores 100 + 10% MP immediately, another 30% over 10 seconds, and reduces aggro slightly.
name: Rejuvenate

description:
Enhances \Skill[191].
The recovery is now 500 + 25% immediately and reduces aggro moderately.
name: Energizing Waters

description:
Enhances \Skill[191].
The waters now apply \State[45], reducing generated aggro(-50%) for the duration of this state.
name: Hallowed Waters

description:
Smites the nearest foe with an aoe of energy damage.
May inflict \State[13](33%).
name: Energy Blast

description:
Enhances \Skill[194].
\Skill[194] has an improved chance to apply \State[13](66%).
name: Enhanced Smiting

description:
Enhances \Skill[194] to always apply \Skill[194].
Also improves the damage formula to scale with proficiency and have a chance to crit.
name: Radiating Forgiveness

description:
Set a void trap that pulses dealing void damage to foes who are caught in it.
May inflict \State[14](10%) per hit.
name: Void Spume

description:
Enhances \Skill[197] to hit more frequently.
\Skill[197] has an improved chance to apply \State[14](20%).
name: Blooming Emptiness

description:
Enhances \Skill[197] to hit even more frequently.
\Skill[197] may also apply \State[1](5%) and now drains all damage dealt.
name: Spiral Death

description:
A standard basic attack.
Deals light physical damage, applies \State[1], and can crit.
name: Attack

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Increases distance traveled by +300%.
name: +Ranged

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Damage formula now leans towards a magical focus.
name: +Magical

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Heals the caster for 100% of the damage dealt.
name: +Absorb

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Defender cannot elementally resist the attack.
name: +True

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Increases projectile count to 3.
name: +Spraying

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Increases knockback by 3 and hit times by +1.
name: +Forceful

description:
Enhances \Skill[201].
Updates the projectile to home into the target.
name: +Homing

description:
A weak fireball from a trap.
Deals (30 - MDF) damage.
name: Fireball Trap

description:
A big and angry heavy blow like from a bear or something.
May apply \State[15](66%) and \State[8](33%).
name: Heavy Blow

description:
Deals light liquid-element damage because kappa's slaps are offensive.
May apply \State[6](66%) and \State[7](66%).
name: Kappa Slap

description: Deals a light amount of poke damage by biting the target.
name: Bite

description:
Flaps wings to stir up quite a breeze dealing air damage in a line.
May apply \State[8](33%).
name: Wing Flap

description:
Fires an enormous-but-slow fireball straight ahead that cannot be parried.
Applies \State[9] and \State[14].
name: Willow's Flame

description:
A dangerously strong blow that deals heavy damage and knocks
the target way back.
name: Crackdown

description:
Touches your target with the hands of death.
Absorbs all damage dealt as life.
name: Death's Touch

description:
Applies \State[63] and \State[17] to the user.
Enables high speed powerful attacks at the cost of being sealed.
name: Fungal Rage

description:
Drains 50 + 10% of the target's max magi.
May apply \State[7](50%).
name: Jelluminance

description:
Smites the nearest foe directly with a sudden stone crush.
May inflict \State[8](20%).
name: Earth Crush

description:
Heals all allies nearby the caster for a small amount and a bit more over time.
Grants \State[64].
name: Faerie Heal

description:
A quick stab at the target that ignores a most of the target's defense.
May cause \State[15](40%).
name: Shank

description:
Throws sand in the eyes of a target which knocks them back significantly.
May apply \State[8](50%).
name: Throw Sand

description:
A swift rake with possibly infected claws.
Inflicts \State[16] and sometimes \State[15](50%).
name: Slobber Slash

description:
Whips the target with their tongue to soften defenses and drain magi.
Applies \State[11].
name: Tonguewhip

description:
Takes a bite out of the target.
Just deals a ton of damage and absorbs life from damage dealt.
name: Devour

description:
Fires off a barrage of stingers that may \State[16](~5x10%).
Deals light damage up to five times.
name: Infestation

description:
Slams the ground and generates a spume of literal void.
Pulse once per second for 5 seconds. May apply \State[10](30%).
name: Void Spiral

description: A liquid-elemental version of the Ranged Attack.
name: Water Shot

description:
A dangerous swing in an arc in front of you.
Deals moderate weapon damage scaling with the user's current health.
name: Ferocious Swing

description:
Attempts to liquify all living entities within reach.
Melts a target and absorbs that matter into itself.
name: Liquify

description:
Deals light ground damage that is absorbed directly as life.
May apply \State[12](50%).
name: Sap

description:
Empowers allies to become more aggressive.
While aggressive, allies have increased power and additional skills.
name: Command: Aggro

description:
An aggressive assault on the target.
May cause \State[15](33%).
name: Aggressive Assault

description: Like a basic attack, but hits twice.
name: Doublestrike

description:
Launches a deadly blast that inflicts \State[16] alongside basic attack effects.
May also apply \State[8](33%) due to the devastating impact of this skill.
name: Venomous Burst

description:
Fires a slow-moving skull that deals %-current health void-typed damage.
Each pulse knocks away the target from the caster.
name: Undying Pulse

description:
Throw a blob in a direction- especially effective against humanoids.
May cause damage and inflict \State[6](50%).
name: Brainfog

description:
Fires a beam of pure energy straight ahead.
Deals heavy energy damage many times to any targets hit.
name: Energy Beam

description:
Fires a beam of pure liquid straight ahead.
Deals heavy liquid damage many times to any targets hit.
name: Water Surge

description:
Increases all parameters by 33%.
Grants skill \Skill[228].
name: Second Phase

description:
Increases all parameters by 33%.
Grants skill \Skill[239].
name: Third Phase

description:
Spews forth a W(3) of flames, dealing moderate heat-elemental damage repeatedly.
Inflicts \State[36] to any damaged foes, and scales with proficiency.
name: Dargin Flames

description:
Smites the nearest foe directly with a single arrow of energy.
May apply \State[7](20%).
name: Energy Arrow

description:
Lobs a blob of thick slime at foes.
May apply \State[76](50%), slowing the movement speed of targets significantly.
name: Slow Slime

description: When struck, may retaliate with \Skill[278](10%), applying \State[10].
name: Auto-Trudge

description:
A carbonated beverage split with allies to restore health and improve morale.
Applies \State[76] and \State[77], increasing power and force by a portion of one another.
name: Lost Medicine

description: Rains down thunder on a designated foe after a long cast time dealing tremendous air-elemental damage.
name: Orcan Shockra

description:
Just hold your guard up to reduce damage by a flat 20.
With careful timing, you can /*parry/*(6f) a foe's incoming attack.
name: Deflect

description:
Enhances \Skill[251].
Successfully parrying will retaliate with \Skill[253].
name: Redirecting Deflect

description:
A retaliation technique.
Retaliates with light non-elemental damage.
name: Counterparry

description:
Enhances \Skill[253].
\Skill[253] will now recover tp/hit.
name: Energetic Counter

description:
Enhances \Skill[251] to now retaliate with \Skill[253] twice.
Upgrades flat reduction to 100.
name: Double Counter

description: Enhances \Skill[253] to possibly apply \State[61](5%) to self, granting bonus crit and movespeed.
name: Accelerating Counter

description: Enhances \Skill[251] to increase the parry window by 50%.
name: Forgiving Deflect

description:
Enhances \Skill[253].
\Skill[253] will apply \State[64] to self when a foe is struck.
name: Healing Counter

description:
Enhances \Skill[251] to now retaliate with \Skill[253] thrice.
Upgrades flat reduction to 255.
name: Triple Counter

description:
Enhances \Skill[251].
tbd
name: Giga Deflect

description: Protect yourself and reduce damage by a 33%.
name: Protect

description:
Enhances \Skill[261].
Grants an additional flat damage reduction of 50 while guarding.
name: Defensive Stance I

description:
Enhances \Skill[261].
Successfully guarding will retaliate with \Skill[264].
name: Thorned Protect

description:
A retaliation technique.
Retaliates with very weak non-elemental damage.
name: Counterguard

description:
Enhances \Skill[261].
Guarding now recovers TP per hit guarded.
name: Technical Protect

description:
Enhances \Skill[261].
Upgrades the flat reduction to 250 and percent reduction to 50%
name: Defensive Stance II

description:
Enhances \Skill[264] to possibly apply \State[61](25%) to self, resisting weapon elements temporarily.
\Skill[264]'s radius is increased by 100% and will persist longer.
name: Compacted Counter

description:
Enhances \Skill[264].
\Skill[264]'s retaliation may apply \State[62](25%) to damaged foes.
name: Debilitating Counter

description:
Enhances \Skill[261].
Upgrades the flat reduction to 500 and percent reduction to 70%
name: Defensive Stance III

description:
Enhances \Skill[261].
tbd.
name: Giga Protect

description:
Deals a small amount of ground-elemental damage to the attacker.
Scales with attacker's health, grants a small bonus of TP.
name: Hard Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage to the attacker.
Is especially effective against undead.
name: Silver Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of void-elemental damage and applies
\State[10], \State[11], and \State[12] to the attacker.
name: Void Spines

description:
Deals a moderate amount of non-elemental damage to the attacker.
Scales with attacker's health and your proficiency.
name: Otherworldy Spines

description:
Deals a small amount of heat-elemental damage to the attacker.
May apply \State[9](10%) with each hit.
name: Burning Body

description:
Deals a small amount of void-elemental damage to the attacker.
May apply \State[14](10%) with each hit.
name: Ghostly Body

description: Rapidly regenerates health in response to being struck.
name: Mitosis

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[9], significantly reducing movespeed and speed and hit rate of attackers.
name: Countertrudge

description:
Heals a small amount and has a small chance of granting up to three buffs:
Shielder(33%), Healthy(33%), Wrath(33%).
name: Puff

description: May apply a variety of puffs to all nearby allies.
name: Mecha-puff Device

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[9], causing HP damage over time, preventing counterattacks, and increasing TP costs.
name: Counter Burn

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[10], significantly reducing movespeed and speed and hit rate of attackers.
name: Counter Trudge

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[11], increasingly affliction rates of elemental debuffs and increasing incoming damage.
name: Counter Soften

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[12], causing HP damage over time, preventing parrying, and reducing magic damage.
name: Counter Crush

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[13], causing MP damage over time, increased aggro generation, and MP costs increase.
name: Counter Radiance

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[14], causing TP damage over time, and prevents healing from any sources.
name: Counter Emptiness

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[17], greatly reducing health recovery and item effectiveness.
name: Counter Seal

description: Lunge forward at high speeds 2 spaces!
name: Lunge

description: Backstep quickly 2 spaces!
name: Backstep

description: Tumble in a designated direction 2 spaces!
name: Tumble

description:
Heals all allies nearby the caster for a small amount.
May apply \State[72](50%).
name: Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom may also apply \State[71] and has -25% cooldown.
name: Hardened Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom may also apply \State[73] and has -50% cast time.
name: Angry Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom always applies its puff effects, and has +200% increased range.
name: Certain Bloom

description:
Enhances \Skill[301].
The bloom now scales with proficiency, can crit, and has -50% cooldown.
name: Kabloom

description:
Creates an earthen shell around the caster that explodes.
Deals light ground damage to all foes near the caster.
name: Siesmic Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The explosion applies \State[8] to enemies and has -50% reduced cast time.
name: Shocking Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The explosion now fires off a cross(4) of shrapnel instead.
name: Shrapnel Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The shell will knockback targets and is extra effective against constructs.
name: Blast Shell

description:
Enhances \Skill[306].
The damage now scales with proficiency, can crit, and fires a nova(8) of shrapnel.
name: Ancient Shell

description:
Applies \State[46] to a nearby ally.
\State[46] increase power and force by +50%.
name: Overgrowth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth also applies \State[47], boosting speed and luck.
name: Hasty Growth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth now has increased range and can apply to multiple allies.
name: Rampant Growth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth also applies \State[48], boosting life and magi.
name: Giant's Growth

description:
Enhances \Skill[311].
The growth also applies \State[49], increasing all growth effects by an additional +50%.
name: Limitless Growth

description:
Strikes a nearby foe and all foes surrounding the target with a
devastating spire of pure earthen elemental energy.
name: Earthen Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force is now extra effective against constructs and hits more times.
name: Destructive Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force may apply \State[50](33%), giving foes the chance(25%) to apply various puffs to you on-hit.
name: Blooming Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force now generates TP(+10/hit/target) and applies \State[50] to self on cast.
name: Invigorating Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[316].
The force is also effective against deities, cannot be parried, scales with proficiency and can crit.
name: Deific Force

description: Fires a slow-moving lob of water that barrels through foes.
name: Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The riptide now fires a W(3) of water lobs that may inflict \State[52](10%/hit).
name: Surging Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The riptide now hits more frequently and generates TP(+2/hit/target).
name: Raging Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The riptide now fires a nova(8) and applies \State[53].
name: Flooding Riptide

description:
Enhances \Skill[321].
The surge no longer has a cooldown after use and hits more frequently.
name: Reflexive Surge

description:
A swift strike with a watery whip.
Deals heavy water damage to targets infront of the caster.
name: Watery Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike may apply \State[20](50%).
name: Sealing Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike applies \State[54] to self when casted, empowering all outgoing liquid damage.
name: Inspiring Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike knocks foes back, and may apply \State[23](50%).
name: Crushing Strike

description:
Enhances \Skill[326].
The strike now scales with proficiency and ignores magic defenses equal to ones' own.
name: Penetrating Strike

description:
Summons a geyser that spews water at any foes nearby.
Deals light liquid damage at most a few times before dissipating.
name: Water Spume

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume may apply \State[5](50%/hit).
name: Spume of Lockdown

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume now knocks foes back and has -30% cast time.
name: Spume of Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume now heals the caster for all damage dealt, and scales with proficiency.
name: Spume of Sustainance

description:
Enhances \Skill[331].
The spume has +300% range, +100% duration, and pulses more frequently.
name: Spume of Mastery

description:
Launches a beam of pure liquid energy straight ahead.
Deals severe liquid damage to all enemies in the line of fire.
name: Liquid Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336].
The force now applies /State[55] and generates TP(+3/hit/target).
name: Rising Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336].
The force now knocks foes back and scales with proficiency.
name: Forceful Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336]. The force can now inflict one or more of a variety of ailments:
\State[4], \State[5], \State[6], \State[7], and/or \State[8], at (10%/hit/target/ailment).
name: Debilitating Force

description:
Enhances \Skill[336].
The force now has -50% reduced cooldown/cast time, and also inflicts \State[56] on foes.
name: Oceanic Force

description:
Deals a small amount of non-elemental damage.
Applies \State[9], significantly reducing movespeed and speed and hit rate of attackers.
name: Auto-Seal

description: Mercilessly destroys otherwise-overly-durable rocks and spires.
name: Ukelele

description:
Blows up after five seconds.
Will destroy destructables near it, and damage foes.
name: Time Bomb

description:
Light those pesky puzzle torches that obviously can't
be lit by \N[2]'s fire spells for some stupid reason.
name: Red Wand

description:
Can overload nearby electronic devices and systems.
May inflict stun(33%) and/or paralysis(33%) if used on enemies.
name: Voltage Baton

description:
A nifty bundle of rope that seems to have a mind of its own.
Enables launching oneself to a given target.
name: Snake Rope
==SUPERLATIVES======
note:
"Combat Passives"
While a battler knows these skills, all
listed states will be permanently affecting
said battler. These states cannot stack,
which means they cannot be re-applied from
any other sources while the battler has
this skill learnt.

description:
dealt void dmg+20%
received void dmg-20%

EXP+10%
